title: Set all positions to 2 open slots

requirements.summary: Update the HeroSection stats bar to display '2 slots' for each position instead of '5 slots'

file_operations.description: Update the stats bar to display '2 slots' instead of '5 slots' for each position (Forward, Center, Guard). Change the hardcoded slot counts in the stats display to reflect the new maximum capacity of 2 slots per position.
